text: Lieutenant General Henry John Coates, AC, MBE (28 December 1932 â€“ 11 June 2018) was an Australian general. He was a senior officer in the Australian Army. He was Chief of the General Staff from 1990 to 1992. Coates died at his Canberra home on 11 June 2018, aged 85. ==References== ==Other websites== *1990 portrait by Heide Smith Category:1932 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Generals Category:Australian military people Category:People from Adelaide
